website_summaries.verdict: Brand recognition doesn't always equal quality. Customers who've used both  OPI and Vinylux say Vinylux lasts longer without chipping.
pros: Extends the life of your nail polish
Comes in high gloss, matte, rapid-dry, and standard
Can be used as a base coat, too
cons: Takes longer to dry than expected
Many reviewers did not like the look of the matte topcoat

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long-time user of OPI base and top coats and thus know the products' performance well. The top coat in particular is the very best one out there. But this particular shipment performed very poorly and uncharacteristically. I used it 5 times and in each case, the top coat cracked on top and you were able to peel most of the entire base/color/top coat off in every case. This has never happened before now. I ended up buying another one from a salon and I received the former result - a top coat that never once cracked or peeled and has stayed on now for over a week. The one I bought through Amazon is clearly counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: shoecollector

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this and I waited until I used it multiple times to write a review. After hours of drying, the top coat gets dented with the slightest touch and it keeps creating bubbles when I had no shaken the top coat. It also gets very stringy. It’s one of the worst products I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS SOOO POOR QUALITY. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Just because amazon didn’t let me return this product I must to warn you guys. THIS IS NOT OPI. IS SOOO POOR QUALITY. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IS HORRIBLE. IM REALLY DESAPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: bubbles??
customer_reviews.text: this product *works* fine, but once it dries, i'm left with a bunch of small bumps on my nail. I tested this polish several times in several different ways. I waited 2 full days before i put the top coat on and once the top coat was on and dried, there always appears these small bubbles. even when i put top coat on shortly after the second color polish coat. i have no idea what the bumps/bubbles are or where they come from. but i'm positive it's 100% this top coat base. sucks because i find $10 for a bottle that doesn't work and can't be returned a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: My polish smeared this badly after an HOUR of dry time. Totally unacceptable at this price point. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra V.

customer_reviews.title: Will not dry
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this as I have tried for a week to get a layer of polish on my nails and everyday have to redo my nails because this top coat will not dry. Even twelve hours later it is still soft enough to just wipe off so as you can imagine any force at all causes lumps and bare tips were the polish has pushed back. After 5 tries I will not be trying this again. I will just polish my nails and leave the top coat off... too much aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This clear top coat pealed right off after drying. Very disappointed after spending $11. Please consider going to a actual beauty store to purchase a real OPI product. I know I will from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! This polish rubs off within hours and smells terrible. I’ve used OPI a lot, so I’m wondering is this is counterfeit. I tried to return the product, but they don’t take returns!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's been 9 months since I purchased this top coat and I still have half left in the bottle. I had high expectations from OPI and this top coat did not fulfill that. Based on several other reviews, they were right about how long it takes to dry. Over time the product becomes too thick to use. Now when I use the top coat, every time I dip the brush in the bottle it leaves with a stringy residue. It like using a glue gun, that same kind of stringy residue that leaves the gun when you stop using it. It's too thick to paint an even coat. I tossed it in the trash. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesemuncher

customer_reviews.title: Not what I got
customer_reviews.text: Not what I received. I ordered this, and got a generic brand top coat. I love in Argentina, and cannot return items...
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor, liquidity, barely dries
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this top coat for years on end now. I wonder if I got a fake because it had such a strong and harsh chemical smell, it was runnier than usual, and it took hours to dry. It usually would take 10-20 minutes to dry, usually faster than not. I had it drying for over an hour and it was still wet, not even a little dry. I found sat around for several hours reading a book and it still wasn’t dry!
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: I do not care for the brand.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a great brand, everyone says so, but the colors have a 'muddy'ness to them and they chip too fast. NOT as good as Brucci, or Sally Hansen Hard as Nails OR Julep, but Julep needs a thinner too often and won't keep long enough for me. Giving my Opi orders away to someone who LOVES the brand!
customer_reviews.author: va_lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to add shine to an old gel manicure
customer_reviews.text: After about a week or so, I like to add another top coat to keep my nails shined. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fake OPI Top Coat!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a fake OPI product. Like many other reviewers, my nails had lots of tiny bubbles after applying this top coat. Even after painting really thin layers of my opi color and drying each layer completely...this top coat ruined all of my work. Not to mention this product has a foul fishy smell when you open the bottle, something is seriously not right. Do not buy this!! You're better off going to target/walmart/cvs to get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first few months. Then it’s horrible.
customer_reviews.text: The brush separates from the top. It is so darn hard to open regardless of soaking under hot water, using nail polish remover to clear any residue. Too expensive for such a bad product. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Pegler

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for my acrylic nails
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 3 bc I expected more with OPI products. I trust OPI products and use them often, however I will not be using this product with my acrylic nails. It came out clumpy and uneven on my acrylic nails. I ended up purchasing a UV curing lamp and a clear gel nail polish which works so much better with my acrylic for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: brandi strong

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on Amazon to purchase a top coat right after the bottle of top coat I had just purchased from Walmart, somehow broke. I was shocked to see that this OPI (which was first on the top coat list), was very fairly priced. It was a bonus to receive it so quickly (during COVID-19 lag)! Thank you!! I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Bellia_Ellemanae

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought this, hardly believing them. I tried it on my natural nail first, and while it did harden I was able to peel it right off. Then I used it on top of some cheap drug store polish. It removed some polish right from the get go, but 10 minutes later was still tacky and smudged badly. Note that Amazon won't return it, either.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Unusually stinky
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this top coat especially because I like OPI brand BUT I’m not sure if this was tampered with or what but it smells terrible, it has a fishy smell. I’ve never had a polish from OPI that smells like this. I can’t get myself to use it, it smells bad. Doesn’t seem right :(
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only experience with clear coats has been the Hard As Nails one, which is fabulous. I thought I'd try OPI, since it seems to be a popular enough brand. It's been quite a disappointment, especially for the price. It begins to chip and peel on the first day of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cha~rlie~

customer_reviews.title: No OPI quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Clearly watered down with some kind of polish remover. I noticed how liquid it was as soon as I opened this. Definitely not OPI quality. Removed my polish as soon as I applied it.
customer_reviews.author: AJAXX

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.text: Really bad top coat, maybe it was a bad batch or whatever but it made my nail polish dry with a ton of bubbles it literally looks gross. Not a single nail of mine dried without bubbles and I tried this top coat on 3 different polishes. Save your money and don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Magic topcoat
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually one that chips regular nail polish in about 45 minutes or less. Every. Time. Well, for some reason I very sleepily, on a whim, bought regular nail polish and regular top coat. I’m now convinced this top coat is magic, as my nail polish is still not chipped with I remove it OVER A WEEK later. SOLD!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Great top coat for dip polish
customer_reviews.text: I do my own dip polish manicures at home and absolutely hate the top coat that comes with. I read some reviews that this product works with dip polish and tried it out. I think it looks just as good as the shiny top coat that comes with the dip sets, but it doesn't smell as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Messed up brush :(
customer_reviews.text: It came with a weird smell and the brush was all kinds of messed up! Hard to apply a good top coat with Bristles poking out all over the place! And I guess it’s something that can’t be returned?! Make sure you know before you but I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Very Glossy Shine
customer_reviews.text: This topcoat goes perfectly over nail-polish for a mirror like, protective finish. This is my favorite top coat brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn101

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this is a FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This has a terrible smell, takes forever to dry, and the label has some inconsistencies with other OPI products that I bought in a brick and mortar store. I am so disappointed. I feel like I got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: KentuckyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen the other reviews claiming this product was counterfeit before purchasing. It most certainly is. OPI was my mother's favorite brand of nail polish and the brand I used when I was growing up. This just isn't it. I opened the bottle to a terrible smell (horribly chemical and like a public bathroom). This was the only bottle of top coat I had so I decided to go ahead and use it anyway. It doesn't provide the nice coat or shine that a real OPI top coat would. Really disappointed to be ripped off this way. I'll be throwing the top coat out and requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ahervey

customer_reviews.title: Better than the "new" formula.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using OPI Start to Finish for quite a few years. It's not cheap, but it's the longest lasting two-purpose product I've found yet. In the past year, OPI introduced a "formaldehyde-free" formula, and since I've always read how bad formaldehyde is for our nails, I tried it. At some point while using it, I started having problems with my nails peeling! It was horrible. It never occurred to me that the "healthy" product could be the cause, so when I ran I out, I bought a second bottle. The peeling problem continued, and finally the light bulb went off. I went back to this "Regular" formula, and guess what? The nails are healing.
customer_reviews.author: TerryD

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a topcoat for polished nails - not by itself.
customer_reviews.text: It peels off immediately - I put it on plain, clean nails as a topcoat but it doesn't stay on. Maybe it needs a coat of polish to stick to it? But ????
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Girl

customer_reviews.title: Drying time is very long
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried opi products before, so i thought i'd try the topcoat. I don't know if this is old product but it takes forever to dry. I wasn't impressed at all. Guess i will stick to the cheap stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best Top Coat Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am not really a "salon polish" snob and I've been using Revlon Quick-Dry top coat for years. I recently had a manicure finished off with OPI top coat and was impressed with how long it lasted, so bought a bottle of my own. It is the best! Lasts forever and doesn't get cracks in it after a few days like some other polishes do. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little disappointed with this. I tried To make sure this was a shiny topcoat, and it look like a shiny don’t go in the picture. But it’s not shiny! Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia N. Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not a successful product for me
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE WASTE OF MY MONEY! I did everything exactly as directed and never saw satisfactory results. Time had nothing to do with the failure as I purchased a second bottle when I had failed to see satisfactory results after first bottle was gone.
customer_reviews.author: HapeDae

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it before, I do my nails and nail polish is nice for 5 days or more when I apply the top coat of OPI, this one is not working the same, the shine is not the same, after 2 days the nail polisc is peeled, horrible.
customer_reviews.author: tamy A Perez

customer_reviews.title: No one has enough time for this top coat.
customer_reviews.text: I tried so hard. 3 mani pedies in 3 days. This top coat DOES NOT DRY. I even tried to let it dry for 2.5 hours today and I could’ve sworn it was TOTALLY dry but nope. 3 hour mark and it was a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent top coat that can be used over dry polish
customer_reviews.text: OPI top coat is a work house I've been using for years. Thick and glossy, with OPI top coat my mani lasts for a week. The disadvantage is that it dries slow, it takes at least an hour to dry. You can buy the little drops to make it dry faster. I keep it on my collection for times when, unlike seche vite, I need a top coat that can be used over dry polish.
customer_reviews.author: R. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Not glossy at all
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of what the description says, this is not a shiny topcoat. It turns dull almost immediately. Do not purchase this product if you want a glossy topcoat.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and takes a long time to dry
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a top coat after applying Opi start to finish base coat and a color. It went on rather thick and remained tacky even after a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles Bubbles Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I had heard great things about this OPI top coat. I was not prepared for all the bubbles and chipping after just one day of use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Ivy

customer_reviews.title: OPI makes a very high-quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am never disappointed with OPI products long lasting last two weeks easily use base coat then the color and then the top coat perfect solution
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Excellent top coat for about 6 months that allows my nails to last without chipping for a week or more. Unfortunately, it got very sticky and thick after about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Castro

customer_reviews.title: not a fan, worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: this takes forever to dry & leaves marks EVERYTIME you touch the nail. took a couple hours to even dry for the slightest so it isn't worth it to me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Galindo

customer_reviews.title: makes it really shine
customer_reviews.text: if you buy the OPI with black top be sure and buy this, you need it to make it work correct. IF the top is silver on the OPI color you do not have to use this. I like both and if it has a black top I use it on it.so the color will shine.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Love

customer_reviews.title: Love OPI but...
customer_reviews.text: This top coat was so thick it took 4 hours to dry and then wasn't entirely dry. Because the bottle was brand new, it was too full to add nail thinner. Since I've used it , I can probably do that now but be careful. It set on the shelf way too long.
customer_reviews.author: LibraryPat

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really find that this filled my ridges. After getting my acrylics off, my nails were left brittle and incredibly damaged with tons of minute ripples and ridges left in them. So, logically, I looked for an alternative to eradicate this. The Ridge Filler does create a protective layer on your nails so they feel less likely to bend and break but I don't think my nails ever ACTUALLY got thicker. The formula for this sheer, milky white polish is easily malleable and leaves a nice, glossy finish, which I like. Just wish it did what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingriego

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t dry, very disappointed. Have used this brand before and it was good. This one I’m throwing out. Will not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jane

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Dries my nails in a matter of minutes while moisturizing my cuticles. Only problem I have with the product is that it is too small. I was able to do 1 drop per nail and got about 500 drops out of the bottle. I change my polish every 2 or 3 days, so I got 3 months use out of this bottle. But if you only do your nails once a week, this bottle will last you a whole year. So depends on the person. Stocked up on it while it was 4$ a bottle with free shipping. I would advise you to do the same if you change your polish and do nail art regularly. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: CastleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: OPI all the way
customer_reviews.text: OPI nail lacquers are excellent. This is my first time trying the top coat, but since I am a fan of this great product already, I know it will not let me down. I prefer OPI, and some Sally H over most other brands is because of the durability,& intense pigments in whatever color you choose; from lightest to the darkest; you are guaranteed to get a solid color with 2 coats; and with the lighter shades, sometimes one coat. Tired of having to touch up chips on your nails every other day, try OPI top coat. First after polishing with a solid color; then 2 thin coats of top coat; then one more coat next day.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Great for anti-chipping
customer_reviews.text: This nail polish works great for avoiding chipping. It can last up to 2 weeks from my own experience, even with washing and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Fantastic Price. Quick Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Came in 2 days. $1.50 less than beauty supply stores. If you can find it. Most stores I checked are sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Nuna

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if this is true OPI
customer_reviews.text: Looks great until it dries. Causes the polish to solidify and become gooey. Unsatisfied with this product, and I don't use it at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Best top coat ever
customer_reviews.text: I use many colors of OPI and other polishes but using OPI top coat is the only one I will use. It adds time (week) to my manicure, also put on additional coats and easily get manicures to easily last 2 weeks. I am not gentle with my nails and it still holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jifo

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the tips ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I now have the prettiest test clips in the whole lab and all the other guys want to know my secrets. As for the top coat specifically -- I put it over the paint and now the paint doesn't rub off. I think that means it's working. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan deWerd

customer_reviews.title: Another very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Helps my nails allot. Polish looks better and stays on better and longer, making my nails stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Marblelutz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this top coat!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this top coat! This is the worst I ever bought. I never dries well and ruins my nail polish everytime. Even a street side store top coat dries better than this one. I'm so disapointed with this brand
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Making Nail Polish Last
customer_reviews.text: The top coat helps nail polish wear 1 week. I do a base coat, 2 coats of polish and a top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lane

customer_reviews.title: Opi products are the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great topcoat. With the addition of drying drops, it dries quickly and doesn't chip easily. My manicure lasts a week if I use rubber gloves for dishwashing and cleaning. The seller is another matter. Salonwholesalers agreed to cancel my order and then shipped it anyway. They told me they would combine shipping for another item, but they didn't tell me how to get combined shipping. And their shipping is slow. They got the order the same day another order to the same area went in. It has taken 3 days longer. I can't figure out how to rate this seller any other way.
customer_reviews.author: S. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Keep your polish on!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST to keep your polish looking like a new manicure!!! Keeps your polish on for over a week or more.... I love it and OPI is the best to buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: PJF

customer_reviews.title: Very good top coat
customer_reviews.text: This brand has always been a winner for me and this top coat did not disappoint. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: bigsis

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever for hard working hands . Nail polish has stayed on perfect for a week now
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrie

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Sticky, tacky and no shine. I will never buy this again. I want a refund but there's a no return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This really isn’t the most protective of your nails and even after dry can get scratches and dents very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Harmer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This top coat used with OPI polishes really stay for a long time, I don’t use any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: D.Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: BUBBLES BUBBLES BUBBLES, it's also incredibly sticky after 10mins and will not dry. The aplicator is HUGE but I guess that's okay. Just really not worth even $5.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: bubbles in the finish
customer_reviews.text: When I use this, it leave ugly bubbles in the finish, complete waste of money. I buy OPI all the time from salons or stores, it is my favorite, there is something wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erin 😊

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Essie, don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch from OPI to Essie a while ago and I when I ran out of top coat I thought I’d try this out. 1) it takes FOREVER to dry 2) your nails look beautiful while they’re wet BUT once they finally dry there’s bubbles under your polish and I’ve had to completely remove my polish, go buy an essie top coat and repaint my nails. Honestly worst top coat I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I love OPI and this topcoat has really helped preserve the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love OPI and this topcoat has really helped preserve the color on my nails for an extended amount of time, rather than other topcoats I have purchased It does cost a little bit more than your retail store brands, but definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: JillM

customer_reviews.title: Great as a clear coat
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a top coat or just a coat on my nails to help them not break.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: No more peeling nails!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to figure out what I was doing to cause my nails to peel. The one item I wouldn't give up was my quick dry top coat. HAH! Guess what was causing my peeling nails? This top coat is thick enough to provide a good shine (2 coats over glitter). It dries relatively quickly, and my manicure lasts at least a week, but sometimes 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Item was broken into several pieces and I can’t get a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken when I received it today. I would like a refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Juhl

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic for a reason. It does exactly what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.author: SFCH

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Nails were not glossy nor protected. Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Jay

customer_reviews.title: This is the best top coat.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this top coat 4 times now. It's solid. It goes on smooth, it protects your color and leaves a lovely gloss. But most importantly this stuff LASTS. My manicure will last until my nail grows when I apply this top coat. It's really great especially for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not real opi
customer_reviews.text: It peels off so easily. No way this is the real opi. I would return but because it’s flammable I can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Get longer polish wear!
customer_reviews.text: I use this over my color street nails especially the tips to get longer life! It works wonderfully and doesn’t mess up the polish/designs of the color street wraps!
customer_reviews.author: Cbobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Worst top coat ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst top coat I have ever used. Honestly- the $1 top coats I’ve purchased are better. This bubbles on top of my polish, leaves a weird residue and prevents the polish from drying for hours. It also has a terrible smell to it. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Quality products every time!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried OPI when my friend gifted me their base coat nail polish. When it came time to purchase a new top coat, I knew OPI was the clear choice! I have not been disappointed. Using OPI's base coat and top coat will help any polish look that much better!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blount

customer_reviews.title: Good top coat
customer_reviews.text: I like the OPI top coat polish. It is glossy and it does protect the color underneath. I only wish that the top coat felt more hard and less likely to get nicked. It feels like nail polish if you use a fingernail and touch the top coat. It doesn't give a feeling of hard protection like I thought top coat should do. I don't even know if I'm making sense here. Anyway, this is a good top coat. Certainly better than others that I've tried. So I'll stick with it for a while. It does seem to take a long time to completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D

customer_reviews.title: Drying time: 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: This stuff takes forEVER to dry. I still haven’t used it successfully because I keep thinking my nails are dry but then messing them up. I don’t have time for this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this top coat! It makes my nail polish shine and last a little longer! It's easy to remove as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and shiny with just one coat. Always loved this brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Product darkened my nails and polish after several days
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to my fingernails, with no polish underneath, and the clear coat turned grey after several days. I also applied this as a top coat for nail polish on my toes and it darkened the polish very noticeably. I would not buy this product again, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Joysie

customer_reviews.title: I finally have nails again
customer_reviews.text: I finally have nails again using the OPI natural base coat, one coat of their Nail Envy, a coat of color and one layer Top Coat for natural nails. Remove and reapply every 7 to 10 days. The paper thin nails are growing again.
customer_reviews.author: DLD

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I use my OPI polish and I go without a chip for at least 2 weeks. I even spent an entire week in the ocean on vacation and on the way home my friend asked me how my pedicure was still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: LeSleepyTree

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice High Quality Opi Product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product received in perfect condition. Would recommend. TY
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Schneider

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SHINE
customer_reviews.text: I buy this over and over again. Gives perfect shine that lasts
customer_reviews.author: Robin Acre

customer_reviews.text: Durability is there and it's a great brand for a topcoat.
customer_reviews.author: Xia

customer_reviews.title: great base...I think...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I'm a dad who paints his daughter's nails...she really likes the daddy and daughter time. I was having problems getting the darn fingernail polish to stick so I thought of using this product. My wife thinks I do a bad job...hey, what do I know?...however, it's nice when the polish stays on longer than a day or two. Needless to say, the polish lasts a lot longer on her nails, so I guess it does what it is supposed to do...
customer_reviews.author: Headless

customer_reviews.title: Good topcoat for OPI!
customer_reviews.text: I love it for a topcoat over OPI Lacquer Polish. It has made a world of difference for my polish to last longer without chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this top coat!
customer_reviews.text: Great top coat! I wash my hands a lot at work as well as working with rubbing alcohol a lot. The days I have to do a lot of blood draws and end up with alcohol all over my hands a lot the top coat will ware away by the end of the day but the polish underneath stays intact and I'm able to go home and apply a fresh top coat. I used to have ruined nails after one day of being at work. Now I can keep the same manicure for a week or more!
customer_reviews.author: JennJennW

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting strengthens nails
customer_reviews.text: This top coat goes way beyond other brands. It lasts a long time and coats the nails with an almost plastic like coating keeping nails strong and polish long lasting. I highly recommend it. I wouldn't wear any other after experiencing opi top coat
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C.

customer_reviews.title: typical top coat
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad, but nothing great. It's your typical top coat.
customer_reviews.author: aclutter526

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend for nail art like stamping
customer_reviews.text: Ok taco/top coat for plain colored nails. Can't recommend for nail art like stamping, but I don't think OPI means for people to use it over stamping? So I don't think you can really fault it for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Top Coat
customer_reviews.text: My wife says this is a great top coat, Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Kaevon P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Top Coat!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this for my top coat! Makes my polish last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, wish it was a little cheaper, I buy a lot of polishes, so O.P.I is not the most in my cabinet. I have tried others and compared and most are just as good and cheaper. I did not have a top coat to compare so I bought this one to see if it is better then cheaper ones I have purchased. I find it to be the same, I do like the brush OPI uses but I'm not sure I would pay more money for a brush, I rather buy more polish lol, just saying
customer_reviews.author: Shari Riley

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used OPI for years and when I opened the bottle, it smelled horrible. But, due the contents, I can’t return it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hillarie Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: waste
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my box the product was open and spilled everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Diana A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but flakes quickly
customer_reviews.text: This polish goes on well but it starts to flake within 2 or 3 days. Back to barielle top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Gail W Mallory

product_meta.title: OPI Nail Polish Top Coat, Protective High-Gloss Shine, 0.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Nail Lacquer is the original NAIL POLISH formula that reinvented quality nail color. Combined with Top Coat Nail Polish, OPI is sure to be your top choice for your weekly manicure. Designed to seal in the color to PREVENTS SCRATCHES AND NAIL CHIPPING. This Nail Polish Top Coat will help you complete just about any look with the NAIL POLISH shade of your choice. For best results, use with OPI Natural Base Coat and your favorite OPI NAIL POLISH shade. Made in the USA. 

 * SEALS IN THE COLOR to prevent scratches and chipping
 * PREVENTS smudges
 * FOR A BEAUTFIUL SHINNING FINISH to your OPI manicure apply one coat of nail polish Top Coat, pulling it over the tips of the nails
 * Use Nail Polish Top Coat as the final step in a manicure service to seal in color and extend wear
 * OPI Nail Lacquer TOP COAT provides up to 7 days of wear with a protective, high gloss shine non-yellowing formula
 * OPI's NAIL POLISH formula that reinvented quality nail color is your top choice if you enjoy updating your manicure weekly
 * For best results, apply OPI Natural Nail Base Coat, then apply two coats of NAIL POLISH color, finish with OPI Top Coat, then let dry
 * OPI NAIL POLISH is available in 200 plush polishes including OPI's most iconic NAIL POLISH and GEL NAIL POLISH shades
 * Awards: Sunday Times Style Beauty Awards 2015
 * If this OPI Nail Polish Top Coat is one of your faves, enroll in Subscribe and Save so you never run out



ABOUT OPI
OPI is the #1 salon NAIL POLISH brand worldwide, offering a full line of nail polish, GEL NAIL POLISH, nail treatments, & skin care products. We exist to transform the world with color, as we believe color brings emotion to life.
